column5: Weather was great. 2-7 degrees temp and sunny.  Wind - 10km South wind .  water clarity - 3ft visibility  Fished from 8:00am -2:30 pm. Worked hard the whole day casting non stop.  Got all three Brown weighing average 5-6 lb  Lure used - a silver minnow 1 oz spoon, a Red devil 1oz spoon, and a Red/black rattler.  I was fishing by myself, and no one to take pictures with me on it,I wanted to speed up everything, so I did not even bother taking the fish out of the net. All fish were release.  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/redspoon.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/IMG_0002-2.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/IMG_0004-1.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/withspoon.jpg  the 3 lures I had used http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/3lures.jpg  Found inside the stomach of the one of the fish that it regurgitated , 4-5" minnows. He was greedy, still hungry for more that  got him in trouble . http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/minnow.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/bassfighter_album/closeup.jpg
I don't understand why they can't stock lake Nipissing with those. ...perch are fun and all ..but  hehe, nice fish man!!
Good job those are some nice fish, and thanks for sharing your findings. Now I know why they love silver/black xraps so much lol.
Aaron,  THanks for your report last week fishing the river. It motivated me to go and give it a try. I got skunk a month ago trying down there.  Keep those smile and report comin'
Nice browns! Thanks for the write up
